title: Ok legit im pissed off again.
body:
Can someone fucking explain to me, how i can go from 0lp b5 to 90!!!! lp b4 and not gain any fucking mmr?

I mean seriously, if i can fucking carry myself up almost 2 entire fucking tiers while only getting 10lp a fucking win im clearly in the wrong fucking mmr.

So why is it that after winning roughly 30 or so fucking games and losing 5-7 i didnt count, that my mmr has gone DOWN? down... Fucking down.

Im sorry, i thought the mmr system was supposed to be correlated to win/loss, so why is it my mmr is going down while i win more games.

Not to mention i lost 3 fucking games, and lost 80 lp.

fucking 80. one of those games was my fault, the other 2 are because no matter how much i fucking yelled at my team to stop fighting on inhib and fight under the nexus towers, they still refused to not fucking lose to a 1v5 and throw the game.

But thats not the main issue, the main issue is that god damn mmr.

Im honestly flabber ghasted, its supposed to work isnt it, you know, win more games get more mmr.

its a bloody simple fucking system, and one which i frankly think is far too simple for a team based game where you queue up solo and get paired with 4 random people, bringing a level of rng into the mix.

But thats beside the point.

The system we currently have the one which is so simple its impossible to fuck up.

has fucked up.

Riot, fix your shit.

replies.body: You are Bronze 4 with a 46% winrate after 474 games... What the fuck do you expect? You spent nearly 500 games completely fucking over your mmr to obtain the lowest rank in league of legends, now you must face the consequences. You are shit. It is your fault. Not Riots. Do you understand how hard it is to even achieve that rank (without trying) yet alone get stuck there with a <50% winrate for 400+ games? of course your mmr is fucked.

Kai sweety.

I played pfft what 100 games in the weeks after preseason.

You know those same weeks when a metric shit ton of level 30 accounts who didnt play ranked and werent very good decided to start playing ranked because "OOO new champ select where i can guarantee my pick, why would i keep playing norms" i raged and tilted myself from b1 mmr to b5 mmr, and the last 300 games have been nothing but me raging at complete retards while i try to climb back out of the hell hole id dug myself into.

The last 2 fucking days are an example of that.

Ive played 474 games, lets round up to 500.

Ive played 40 games in the last two days, and lost including the last 3 (where i was very tilted) 10 games, that puts me at a 75% win rate.

You want to know how i achieved such a crazy win rate?

I left for a week and stopped being fucking angry at every single last downsyndrome kid who thinks they are ready for ranked.

I dont belong in this mmr trust me.

I know this, because i PLACED b2 last season, and climbed up from there, not even climbed from b5 placed at it, the only reason im here, is because i have ZERO tolerance for stupid people.

>and lost including the last 3 (where i was very tilted)

And this is why your taking so long to climb, stop playing when your tilted, the more losses you have the more your MMR will stay the same.

>Ive played 40 games in the last two days, and lost including the last 3 (where i was very tilted) 10 games, that puts me at a 75% win rate.

And this means nothing, because statistics have variables, anyone could go on a 75% win rate at any time with just a decent amount of luck, does that mean anything? No.

Stop blaming people and concentrate on your own gameplay and you will climb. Was placed bronze 3 and kept on raging at people and remained there, changed my ways and tried improving on myself instead and now am silver 4 and climbing.

just dont play ranked, ive played one game in the last month and it was the first game in a couple of weeks in which people pretty much just trolled,fed and flamed, its all about luck not skill and the mmr systems just to lazy and shitty, i mean the elo rating system was designed for chess which is a 1v1 game, yet this system bases your rating off  of four other fuckheads ruining your games, its dumb.

its the only thing i play league for.

Ive played far too long to have fun with league anymore.

Frankly i just want all the shitcunts who only want to have fun to fuck off from my ranked games.

Im here to win, not make friends, if you want to do that norms is the way to go.

And frankly the sooner riot gives norms dynamic queue so they will fuck off back to norms the better.
If you aren't going pro, which I am gunna assume you aren't, and you don't enjoy the game or play with friends, then there really seems to be no reason to keep wasting your time?

I play it to waste time and fulfill my craving for competition.

Im basically waiting for paragon to be released and if that game doesnt flop ill be playing that instead of league.

If that game fails im back to playing league until a suitable replacement comes along.

Granted the reason i get pissy is because of said craving for competition.

Im am purely playing ranked to win at the level that i play at that may not be gold or silver but its not fucking b5 atleast when i was in b1 i had some kind of challenge beyond trying to organise the children i get for teammates, in fact the only times where i fuck around in ranked (like that S- mordekaiser game where i just built 4 pairs of sorc boots and a liandries and rylais) is where i recognize that the enemy team is absolute shithouse so i try to make it atleast somewhat fun for myself by limiting myself.
Plenty of other games out there man, maybe mobas aren't your thing due to their random player nature, maybe you're for a different style of game like ark, fallout or csgo

Well actually i recently played a moba with a 1v1 queue pretty recently.

I had an absolute blast.

The actual genre i love, its the entire reason ive stuck around all these years even after league went mainstream and ranked turned to shit (btw this is an alt account)  what i dont love is the community and the attitude players in bronze have.

I would happily pay a great deal of money to have my mmr reset to silver, just so i can prove i am capable of staying in that mmr.

because as far as im concerned its far harder to climb out of bronze than it is to climb out of silver.

Because atleast in low silver to high gold Players have some sense of skill, sure their still fucking shit, but atleast they arent glue sniffing runaans huricane building xins who try to 1v5 in the middle of lanes (yes i have had that on my team before, yes we did lose)

Actually recently since they added autofill im more likely than ever to quit league.

Just got into a game now and got autofilled bot, i mean im  a mastery 6 lucian but that doesnt mean i enjoy playing adc with a rando as my sup, this rustles my jimmies that they implement a system that forces you to play lanes you dont want, and you still end up with 20 minute queue times.

> Well actually i recently played a moba with a 1v1 queue pretty recently.

> I had an absolute blast.

So why not go play that game? You obviously don't enjoy League anymore, so why keep playing it? There are plenty of other competitive games around, competitive MOBAs included.

> I would happily pay a great deal of money to have my mmr reset to silver, just so i can prove i am capable of staying in that mmr.

You already have one alt account why not make another? With Tier 2 runes at 1IP now and the levelling exp halved it's not that hard to lvl a smurf and effectively reset your mmr to Silver 3~

> Because atleast in low silver to high gold Players have some sense of skill,

Scores in low elo are always going to be polarising, because player skill is unreliable and inconsistent. They might be a good Lucian one game, but don't know how to consistently be a good Lucian.

And it's been mentioned but I'll say it again, if you yourself are a good player (i.e belong in a higher elo) then the enemy team has a higher chance (5/5 players) of having more bad players on their team then your team (4/5 players) does. 

> Actually recently since they added autofill im more likely than ever to quit league.

Top and Mid are highly sought roles, if you're queuing with two popular roles then you can expect to get autofilled into something else every now and again, it's usually good practice to learn and then assign your second role as something less popular (jng/supp) to guarantee your chances of getting a role you can play well. That is simply the climate of the game at present.

> that doesnt mean i enjoy playing adc with a rando as my sup

If you're so keen on satisfying competition why not find someone of your approximate skill and motivation and queue with them? YOu can only help your chances.

> and you still end up with 20 minute queue times.

Same deal with the roles, it's having trouble finding open top/mid lanes, and autofill had to be implemented carefully so as not to have people who pick only popular roles bitching about how they never get said roles for the sake of 5 min queue times.

I've played B3 - G5 with Supp/Mid assigned and never had a queue longer than 5 minutes. 

You'd be surprised the impact you can make as supports like Nami/Lulu/Karma/Zyra, maybe it;s time to switch up your roles and take the time to master something different.

Oh trust me im pretty confident in every role except jungle (and jungle is mostly because my champion pool for junglers is very limited, yes im bronze so my champion pool is quite vast but a jack of all trades, thats why im saying champions im confident i can carry with, so kayle (extremely high winrate compared to the rest of my pool hence why im mastery 7), mordekaiser, etc)

if i get support im actually a quite good sona (100% winrate with her so far but its only early days with her so who knows when ill get that first loss) but again im not confident i can carry with her because bot lane is a 2 part situation, when i play with my mate elem who i know is a decent adc and synergises well with me ill happily lock in support and go to town.

But unfortunately i cant always play with friends which is why i try to focus on my solo lane performance over my duo lane performance, because in a solo lane i can be far more consistent as my performance is the only factor.

infact top lane has my highest winrate out of every lane not because im some amazing top laner far from it, but because its isolated from the rest of the lanes, so im the least likely to get ganked (and if i do get ganked im usually not over extended so i usually survive) and im less likely to get roamed from mid, this allows me to get quite fed from farming or simply outskilling my opponent and then use that power to boost other lanes.

infact in the games where i rage when im playing top lane its usually from lets say the mid laner feeding, their fed mid laner realises i am a threat brewing and decides to repeatedly roam top putting pressure on my lane.

Now assuming my mid laner is smart enough to recognize this and pushes their lane out its all fine and dandy ill be a bit pissy about getting camped but hey it worked out, if they dont do that thats when i get tilted.



As for why i dont play the 1v1 moba, its some Chinese mobile moba knock off thing with a heavy pay to win format, great for a few minutes of fun, but definitely not my daily driver moba.

Finally as for the i only have 4 bad players and they have 5, yes thats why i get fed from my own lane, but its also the reason the game is very rng based, i go into these games expecting atleast one lane to feed and its just a guessing game of which lane feeds and whos team it is.

And unfortunately it doesnt matter how many bad players are on each team because all it takes is one bot laner collectively dying 10 times to have a monstrous adc banging down your door that you cant outskill because they have 8k gold on you.

Oh forgot to address the alt situation, I would but ive vested a bit of currency into this alt to the point its basically my main now, and i have a few things i cant just buy on the other alt should i do decently (project lucian with border, mastery tokens etc, along with some high value skins ive gotten through hextech like dj sona)

When i made this account the only valuable thing my main had was the perfect ascension icon so it was worth tossing aside.

Now if support would allow me to transfer my stuff over thats a different story but i doubt riot has the time nor would want to (more alts means more money right so why transfer skins over)

Well as far as alts are concerned, if you really don't want to play normals, it might be a good way to reset your rank, improve some in your new rank, then take that improvement back to your main. I can almost guarantee if you can climb on the alt for a while then you'll climb when you jump back to your main.

Part of the problem is, you've played so many games where you are, that even if you are better than everyone else where you are, you have no means to improve. By far the fastest way to improve is to play with/against and then catch up to people of greater skill than you. If you are already top rung where you are, then you aren't going to be able to climb the metaphorical ladder of improvement, you need to find a taller ladder (terrible metaphor I know but it illustrates my point).
that actually makes alot of sense, guess im rolling a throwaway alt then.

That feel when i know exactly how the mmr system works because ive been playing league since 09.

Lp gain is tied to your mmr value so as to stop artificial growth.

That way you cant have a diamond 1 with bronze mmr.

And if you somehow did mange to create such an abomination they would gain 1 lp per win and lose 40 for every loss.

There a myriad of videos you can go watch explaining that from people far more respected than I.

That feel when you play like shit when you are too busy saving yourself from a brain aneurysm dealing with retarded players in your games.

Id much rather get stomped by people better than me knowing my team is also better than me.

Its fucking infuriating when some shitstain who i have DESTROYED 20 times prior gets fed off one retard, and then stomps my team simply because of rng.

And that rage makes you play like fucking shit.

Standard YellowBrickRoad post...

Reading this post, like all of your other ones, it is clear why you are not climbing. You blame everyone else and never try to think what you could do to prevent the losses. raging at your team? when ever has that lead to someone positively replying to you or your team making better decision? never. You are the only one to blame here, mmr and rank are fairly well sorted after 100 games, if you're still there at 500 then it is your elo, either improve how you approach a game or embrace your true elo, because you are behaving exactly like a low tier bronze player would

And if you wanna blame trolls, just remember that the enemy team gets them to just like you and they seem to be doing fine

Im not blaming trolls.

Im blaming the 9 players in my game that i have to beat to win.

5 on the enemy team, and 4 anchors on my own team.

personally i would love for riot to release magma chamber, and include ranked magma chamber.

So its just nothing but 1v1's

Pure skill.

No more blaming teams.

And no more teams being at fault.

Like shit i already queue for only top and mid, simple because they are the two lanes where i can effectively ignore my team and get into my zone and start roaming around and helping after im already fed.

Instead of say jg where im watching 3 lanes of bullshit.

or adc or sup where no matter which of the two you choose you are in for a world of headaches as the other person cant carry their god damn weight.



Hell i even get pissy when  the enemy team is shit.

Because it just reminds me of what elo im in and takes all the fun out of beating their ass, stomping someone isnt fun unless you did it by punishing a mistake.

Then get fed, and carry. PLay op champs that snowball. Get 3 kills of your enemy laner, then go push a tower or get kills from another lane, be the one to snowball and carry instead of expecting your team to go well or not feed, destroy the enemy so they cant
